							                    Proximal Urethral Cancer
							                    Treatment of proximal urethral cancer or urethral cancer that affects the entire urethra is different for men and women.   For women, treatment may include the following:         -  Radiation therapy and/or surgery (open excision, transurethral resection) for tumors that are  of an inch or smaller.    - Radiation
